channel.title: Killed BD by guarding that BD when i tried guarding King?
channel.description:
#### What happened? I'm Knight, I guarded king [16] and the system said "you killed someone guarding [1]" and then [1] was dead the next morning, ended up being a physician, and had my deathnote.
so how did my guard switch from king to 1, and how did 1 die if i was guarding him, and and how was I the person who killed him when i was supposedly guarding him, and how can a knight kill a physician?
also i believe it was a reaper game so possessor should have nothing to do with this.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to guard the king.
#### Steps to reproduce: None
#### Comments- here is a screenshot, hopefully it uploads right.
![20180101134427_1|690x388](upload://s43Uchik4231r1XZU3PWlJRZt7w.jpg)

Read full topic

item.title: Killed BD by guarding that BD when i tried guarding King?
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
What happened?

I’m Knight, I guarded king [16] and the system said “you killed someone guarding [1]” and then [1] was dead the next morning, ended up being a physician, and had my deathnote.

so how did my guard switch from king to 1, and how did 1 die if i was guarding him, and and how was I the person who killed him when i was supposedly guarding him, and how can a knight kill a physician?

also i believe it was a reaper game so possessor should have nothing to do with this.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I was supposed to guard the king.

Steps to reproduce: None
